blocks.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
blocks.text: If [name] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

blocks.name: Multiattack
blocks.text: [name] can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

blocks.name: Bite
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d10 + str] piercing damage.

blocks.name: Claw
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d6 + str] slashing damage.

blocks.name: Tail
blocks.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* atk[str] to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. *Hit:* dmg[2d8 + str] bludgeoning damage.

blocks.name: Frightful Presence
blocks.text: Each creature of [name]'s choice that is within 120 feet of [name] and aware of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to [name]'s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

blocks.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
blocks.text:
[name] uses one of the following breath weapons.

**Acid Breath.** [name] exhales acid in an 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking dmg[14d8] acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
**Slowing Breath.** [name] exhales gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

blocks.name: Change Shape
blocks.text:
[name] magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form ([name]'s choice).
  In a new form, [name] retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

blocks.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
blocks.text: [name] beats its wings. Each creature within 15 ft. of [name] must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or take dmg[2d6 + str] bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. [name] can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendaryActions.description: [name] can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. [name] regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
